# Cancel a User Invitation

**Web Service Endpoint**

Cancel a pending invitation for a user to join your team.

## Sending and Canceling Invitations

- **Invite a User**: Invite a user with assigned user roles to join your team.

items.description: Invite a user with assigned user roles to join your team.
